display_long_description:
Join the excitement in BeatsPunch, where you can test your reflexes, coordination, and precision by punching your way through exhilarating music tracks. The game automatically detects and syncs with any MP3 songs in your Oculus Quest's "Downloads" or "Music" folders, creating a dynamic, personalized experience.

With the new multiplayer beta, invite your friends to join the fun and Compete with up to 4 of them in real-time. Share your favorite songs and challenge each other to beat the highest scores. Unleash your competitive spirit and see who can master the rhythm.

Experience the visually stunning environment of BeatsPunch, specifically designed to immerse you in a world of pulsating beats and fast-paced action. Stay engaged with the game's satisfying haptic feedback and intuitive controls, allowing you to feel every punch and swipe.

Don't miss the opportunity to dive into this rhythm-packed adventure, and share the experience with your friends in the multiplayer beta. Download BeatsPunch now and become the ultimate music warrior with your own unique song library!
